channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: Murdoch and Brackenreid are stunned when an actor in a performance of "Hamlet" dies on stage before their eyes.

channel.title: Call the Midwife
channel.desc: Sister Julienne calms an anxious mother; Jenny's patient experiences complications; Chummy finds out that her mother has left her father; Trixie is disappointed when Ted cancels a date.

channel.title: CBC Toronto News
channel.desc: Dwight Drummond and the CBC Toronto News team take a comprehensive look at the day's top stories, with breaking news, live reports and updates relevant to the city of Toronto.

channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Gary's mystery visitor reveals the events that led to his hospitalization.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Just for Laughs: Gags
channel.desc: There's no sound, but there sure are plenty of laughs; this crazy Quebec-based troupe uses the city as its stage, and its inhabitants, or victims, as characters.
